snippet.title: Best video game consoles
snippet.description: The "next-generation" game consoles are here -- but until their game library hits critical mass, the

snippet.title: Mad Skills BMX
snippet.description: If you like a serious challenge, this racing game has all the bells and whistles, offering plenty of free content and several tracks to thrill and frustrate you.

snippet.title: Duet Game
snippet.description: Easy to learn, but extremely difficult to master, Duet Game is a must-have for serious gamers who don't mind repetition while going for the proverbial perfect run.

snippet.title: Fire Game Controller
snippet.description: Get ready for living-room gaming, Amazon-style: a new controller aims to bring games to the big screen with Fire TV.

snippet.title: Game Boy: Nintendo's unlikely masterpiece
snippet.description: Nintendo's iconic Game Boy stormed past its rivals, becoming one of gaming's most unlikely success stories. We look back in this nostalgia-packed feature.

snippet.title: The Walk Fitness Tracker Game
snippet.description: Despite its complex interface and high download price, The Walk: Fitness Tracker Game is an excellent way to make your daily walk interesting again.

snippet.title: The best Game Boy Advance emulator for iOS is available now, no jailbreak required
snippet.description: Nintendo fans rejoice: GBA4iOS 2.0 -- a project of indie developer Riley Testut for the last two years -- just went live, and it's the easiest way to play Game Boy games on the iPhone.

snippet.title: Forget Xbox One and PS4, nothing beats Game Boy (video)
snippet.description: The first episode of Adventures in Tech reveals how Nintendo's underdog handheld became an unlikely masterpiece.

snippet.title: PS4 and Xbox One? Pah! Nothing beats Game Boy
snippet.description: In episode one of Adventures in Tech we shine a spotlight on Nintendo's iconic console, and how it destroyed rival handhelds.

snippet.title: Detonate a nostalgia bomb with our gorgeous Game Boy pictures
snippet.description: We've given Nintendo's late '80s masterpiece the close-up treatment! Bring your childhood screaming back with these stunning images.
